title: Identification of novel NLRP3 inhibitors as therapeutic options for epilepsy by machine learning-based virtual screening, molecular docking and biomolecular simulation studies
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Maryam Zulfat, Mohammed Ageeli Hakami, Ali Hazazi, Arif Mahmood, Asaad Khalid, Roaya S. Alqurashi, Ashraf N. Abdalla, Junjian Hu, Abdul Wadood, Xiaoyun Huang
